data.title: Great Place to Relax and Have Some Great Coffee
data.text: I have been going here for years. The employee are always friendly and the coffee is always great. The offer live bands on the weekends.

data.title: Marble Mocha that is fabulous
data.text: I love the marble mocha in whatever form.  Really like the laid back chill atmosphere and the drinks are rich in flavor.

data.title: Quick stop for ice coffee
data.text: Since I come here a few months ago, I saw a lot of coffee places and it makes me happy. So yesterday I stopped by at High Point Coffee. My husband said I should try because he liked it a lot. So we stopped by to get some coffee before we headed to a store. We ordered Caramel Karma with extra shot for 24 oz since we wanna shared. Soon as we got the coffee I can't wait to try! Oh my gawd I love it after my first sip! It was smooth and the caramel was just blended so well with the coffee. The extra shot gave more extra special taste to the coffee. I would say this so far my favorite flavor and I definitely will come again for my own Caramel Karma. By the way they also have tea for tea drinkers. From the menu I can see they have green tea, black tea and herbal tea. So I think for people who concerns about their healthy drinks maybe they have something for you. But I highly recommended this place for whoever wanna try High Point Coffee this week!

data.title: Small town feel, with BIG time Java!
data.text: I love this place! Great drinks, great food and way friendly service. I have been coming here for years and haven't had a bad experience yet. I recommend trying one of the Barista's recommended drinks, haven't gone wrong.

data.title: Great Coffee and Live Music
data.text: Great Coffee and live music on the weekends. The customer service is excellent. I frequent daily and have never been disappointed!

data.title: Great coffee house with open Mic on Saturday nights
data.text: High Point has very friendly baristas and very good coffee selections. What helps set them apart is that they have open Mic from 7-10pm every Saturday. Sign up starts at 6pm. There is most often some very talented performers.

data.title: Yummy coffee
data.text: This place has verrry good coffee. I love their frozen coffees the most. They also sell smoothies which is very cool! Great place.

data.title: Great coffee!
data.text: I stopped in on a Monday morning and the drive thru line of about 6 cars in front of me went pretty quickly. Also, I got my Mocha and a free chocolate coffee bean on top of lid! Very nice place with great coffee and service!
